data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 30302, Version Hash: db622561b65eae5128bc8eab9db7679a4527c3fb
data.actual_result: No prompt is shown in a DM call to stream the application osu!
data.expected_result: If followed all the steps previously than you should have a prompt to stream the application (osu!)
data.short_description: Whilst in a discord DM call with a friend, there are some full screen applications, for example osu! which cannot be streamed
data.steps_to_repro: - Select a friend - Start a 'call' with them - Open an application (osu!) - Click share screen - Click stream -
